title: The Explosive Ukraine Scandal You’re NOT Hearing About (Ep 1729)
description:
In this episode, I address the biggest political scandal you’re NOT hearing about - the swampy Ukraine corruption and the Hunter laptop. 

News Picks:

Big tech is an existential threat to democracy. 


Those cowardly “intelligence” officials who claimed the laptop was Russian disinformation, now refuse to apologize


They disgraced themselves to protect the Biden family, and their response is even worse.

Democrat economist calls out Joe Biden for his fuel prices fairytales. 

Follow the money, part one.

Follow the money, part two.


Fact-checking the Democrats’ claims on gas price hikes.
